snippet.title: Escaping Atlantis Steam Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1260450/Escaping_Atlantis/ 

Escaping Atlantis is a roguelite deckbuilder where all your cards are unique Atlanteans. Get to know them, direct them in tactical battles and strengthen your team to face bigger challenges, all with the hope of.. Escaping Atlantis!

Join the discord: http://discord.roofkat.com/
Find us on twitter: https://twitter.com/roofkatgames
